name: Save Me a Light
description:
a little girl gives people lanterns.

but a little more than that happens.

this game is pretty short, and was made for a game jam but not quite in time. on a personal note, this is the first game i've ever published, and i'm aware of literally all the poor quality stuff in here LMAO but i hope you'll enjoy the story if nothing else. trust me, the next games are gonna have higher quality.
